action_plan: Enter 'amazon.com' into the browser's URL bar and navigate to the site.
Locate and select the Amazon shopping cart icon to view the current contents of the cart.
Use Amazon's search function to find the Bose SoundLink Mini.
Select the product to go to its detail page.
Click on 'Add to Cart' to add the Bose SoundLink Mini to the shopping cart.
Navigate to the shopping cart again to review the item.
Select 'Proceed to Checkout' to begin the checkout process.
